caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. A man and a naked woman are engaged in an intimate conversation. Afterward, the man leaves, and the woman goes into a bath. Later, the man and the woman meet someone at the door. At that moment, a group of people on horseback, seemingly a nomadic tribe, arrives. Their leader glances at the woman and then departs. Meanwhile, the man, another gentleman, and the woman are engaged in conversation. Subsequently, the three of them walk along the road, chatting as they go. On the other side, a woman is brushing her daughter's hair, while outside, a party is in full swing, with people mingling and toasting. At this point, one person walks in, warmly greeted by another person, and they embrace.
